verses.name: Ezekiel 35:13
verses.text: Thus with your mouth ye have boasted against me, and have multiplied your words against me: I have heard them.

verses.name: Ezekiel 35:14
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord God; When the whole earth rejoiceth, I will make thee desolate.

verses.name: Ezekiel 35:15
verses.text: As thou didst rejoice at the inheritance of the house of Israel, because it was desolate, so will I do unto thee: thou shalt be desolate, O mount Seir, and all Idumea, even all of it: and they shall know that I am the Lord.
